column1: title: BNP Paribas’ commitment to universities and schools

column2: BNP Paribas has offered an Excellence Program targeting new Master’s level graduates (BAC+5) who show high potential. The aid program lasts 18 months and comprises three assignments of six months each. It serves as a strong career accelerator that enables participants to access high-level management positions at a faster rate. The program allows participants to discover the BNP Paribas Group and its various entities in France and abroad
column3: build an internal and external network by working on different assignments and receive personalized assistance from a mentor and coaching firm at every step along the way.
